roleset.name: put under a spell
roleset.note: ENCHANT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'enchant' based on sentences in brown. (from enchant.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: instrument, if agent is also present

example.name: instrumental agent
example.text: ``Heaven forbid''! Cried [the ladies]-1, enchanted [*]-1 by his music.
